price: Hao ndio Mwenyezi Mungu alio walaani, na akawatia uziwi, na akawapofoa macho yao.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ
footnotes: Hao ndio alio watenga mbali kabisa Mwenyezi Mungu na rehema yake, na akawatia uziwi wasiisikie Haki, na akawatia upofu wa macho wasiione Njia ya Uwongofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
